overview:
Loy is a startups analyst/consultant with several years of experience in management consulting. He is an avid reader, writer and researcher.

Loy Okezie is the founder of StartupsNigeria.com, a technology blog about startups, social media and mobile applications with an international focus on Nigeria.

Before now, he has worked in training & consulting for a Lagos-based management research & consulting firm. He ventured into online publishing since 2004 and enjoyed early successes in his new career in the digital media industry.

He holds a bachelors degree in Business Administration from the University of Abuja, Nigeria and is a certified public speaker. He speaks French fluently.

He founded StartupsNigeria.com from his apartment in a town called Montreuil in France. After living in Europe for about 3 years, he now lives in Lekki, New Lagos, where he runs his company.

milestones.description: Loy Okezie added a position as Founder at Startups Nigeria
Loy Okezie added a position as Head, Business Strategy & Communications at Nigeria 2.0
Loy Okezie added a position as Content Director at ConnectNigeria.com
